table.name: vtiger_bhscdrs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscdrs` ( `bhscdrsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscdrs_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscdrsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscdrscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscdrscf` ( `bhscdrsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscdrsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
